name: Casio fx9xxx note tool
short_description:
This tool supports a small subset of LYX & MS word style backslash commands to insert special characters. This allows one to code on a computer and makes advanced notes easier to type into print statements. The main feature is its ability to arrange print statements to fully utilise the screen. It achieves this by automatically inserting carriage returns and quotation marks where needed. It will also hyphenate long words, with the severity of hyphenation being adjustable.

The program will connect and transfer data with the calculator upon execution.
summary: This tool helps to create notes for Casio fx9xxx series calculators
